AE.name: United Kingdom ANA (Article Numbering Association)
AE.desc: Identifies the Article Numbering Association of the United Kingdom.

AF.name:
ANSI ASC X12 (American National Standard Institute Accredited
                                    Standards Committee X12)
AF.desc:
Identifies the United States electronic data interchange standards
                                    body.

AG.name: US DoD (United States Department of Defense)
AG.desc:
The United States Department of Defense is the entity controlling the
                                    message specification.

AH.name: US Federal Government
AH.desc:
The United States Federal Government is the entity controlling the
                                    message specification.

AI.name: EDIFICAS
AI.desc:
European EDI association for financial, informational, cost,
                                    accounting, auditing and social areas.

CE.name: CEFIC (Conseil Europeen des Federations de l'Industrie Chimique)

ED.name: EDIFICE (Electronic industries project)
ED.desc:
EDI Forum for companies with Interest in Computing and Electronics
                                    (EDI project for EDP/ADP sector).

EE.name: EC + EFTA (European Communities and European Free Trade Association)
EE.desc: The European Communities and the European Free Trade Association.

EN.name: EAN International
EN.desc:
International organization of EAN Member Organizations, that along
                                    with the Uniform Code Council manages the EAN.UCC System (a series of standards for
                                    supply chain management).

EW.name: UN/EDIFACT Working Group (EWG)
EW.desc:
United Nations working group responsible for UN/EDIFACT (United
                                    Nations, Electronic Data Interchange for Administration, Commerce and Transport).

OD.name:
ODETTE (Organization for Data Exchange through Tele- Transmission in
                                    Europe)

RT.name: UN/ECE/TRADE/WP.4/GE.1/EDIFACT Rapporteurs' Teams
RT.desc:
United Nations Economic UN Economic Commission for Europe (UN/ECE),
                                    Committee on the development of trade (TRADE), Working Party on facilitation of
                                    international trade procedures (WP.4), Group of Experts on data elements and
                                    automatic data interchange (GE.1), EDIFACT Rapporteurs' Teams.

UN.name: UN/CEFACT
UN.desc:
United Nations Centre for Trade Facilitation and Electronic Business
                                    (UN/CEFACT).
